title: Pixel 5 mic suddenly stopped working
content:
Today my Pixel 5 mic suddenly stopped working, if I am going on Speaker mode or connecting earphone then mic is working.
- I have already tried to go in safe mode, no change.
- I tried to reboot phone many times, no change.

I searched over Google but able to find any specific solution for this, 2 days back only I have installed new monthly security update but till today afternoon it was working fine.
